mapper.select: select t.PARK_ZONE "area",c1 "total",decode(c2,null,0,c2) "free",c1-decode(c2,null,0,c2) "used" from (select count(0) c1,PARK_ZONE from t_park group by PARK_ZONE) t left join (select count(0) c2,PARK_ZONE from t_park where PARK_STATE=1 group by PARK_ZONE) n on t.PARK_ZONE =n.PARK_ZONE order by t.park_zone
select (select count(0) from t_park) "total", (select count(0) from t_park where park_state =1) "free", (select count(0) from t_park where park_state =2) "used" from dual
select PARK_ID "carLocationId",PARK_STATE "state",PARK_ZONE "area",PARK_3did "threeId",PARK_2did "twoId",to_char(PARK_CDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "cdate" from T_PARK where PARK_STATE=2
mapper.update: update T_PARK set PARK_STATE=2 where PARK_ID=#{0}
update T_PARK set PARK_STATE=1 where PARK_ID=#{0}
mapper.select: select t_car.car_id "carId",park_2did "twoId",ower_name "owerName",t_park.park_id "parkId",park_zone "area",park_x "xCoord",park_y "yCoord",car_color "color",dock_stime "iDate" from t_dock ,t_car,t_park,t_ower where t_dock.car_id=t_car.car_id and t_dock.park_id=t_park.park_id and t_car.ower_id=t_ower.ower_id and t_dock.car_id=#{0} and t_dock.dock_state=1

select t_car.car_id "carId",park_2did "twoId",ower_name "owerName",t_park.park_id "parkId",park_zone "area",car_color "color",dock_stime "iDate",dock_picture "file" from t_dock ,t_car,t_park,t_ower where t_dock.car_id=t_car.car_id and t_dock.park_id=t_park.park_id and t_car.ower_id=t_ower.ower_id and t_park.park_2did=#{0} and t_dock.dock_state=1
select park_id "parkId",park_state "parkState",park_zone "parkZone",park_cdate "parkCdate" from t_park where park_state=1
mapper.update: update T_PARK set PARK_STATE=#{parkState} where PARK_ID=#{parkId}
